SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection

Interface ConnectionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface ConnectionHandler
This is the interface that handles all the communication methods, it will be implemented by the two classes that handles the connection with RMI and TCP

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkValidRetrieve(ArrayList<Coordinates> tiles)
    first method to be invoked during a turn, make it possible to evaluate a retrieve of tiles from the living room board

    the client can perform the joinLobby method to join the lobby with a username

    second method to invoke during a turn, it make it possible to moves the selected tiles (ordered as the client wish) in a column of the bookshelf

  • Method Details

    • close

      void close() throws IOException
      the close() method permit to close the connection between client and server
      Throws:
      IOException

    • JoinLobby

      void JoinLobby(String username) throws RemoteException
      the client can perform the joinLobby method to join the lobby with a username
      Parameters:
      username - the username used for joining the lobby
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • CreateGame

      void CreateGame(int nPlayers) throws RemoteException
      the createGame method perform the game creation in the server
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - the number of player for the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • JoinGame

      void JoinGame() throws RemoteException
      make it possible for the player to join an open, casual game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • checkValidRetrieve

      void checkValidRetrieve(ArrayList<Coordinates> tiles) throws RemoteException
      first method to be invoked during a turn, make it possible to evaluate a retrieve of tiles from the living room board
      Parameters:
      tiles - the tiles to be selected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • moveTiles

      void moveTiles(ArrayList<Coordinates> tiles, int column) throws RemoteException
      second method to invoke during a turn, it make it possible to moves the selected tiles (ordered as the client wish) in a column of the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      tiles - the selected tiles
      column - the column of the bookshelf that has been chosen
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • sendHeartBeat

      void sendHeartBeat() throws RemoteException
      used to send heartbeat to the server, ensures the client is still active
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection problem occurs

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String content)
      used to send a broadcast chat message
      Parameters:
      content - content of the message

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String recipient, String content)
      used to send a private chat message
      Parameters:
      recipient - recipient of the message
      content - content of the message

    • getServerIP

      String getServerIP()
      Getter for the server ip
      Returns:
      the server ip

    • getServerPort

      int getServerPort()
      Getter for the server port
      Returns:
      the server port
